scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Churn Prediction
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data from a publicly accessible churn prediction model deployed by a consumer banking institution. The attacker uses a model inversion attack to infer details like income levels and spending habits, violating customer privacy.
initial_goal: Develop a method to infer sensitive customer attributes from the publicly available customer churn prediction API.
enterprise_context: Consumer Banking: The AI model predicts customer churn based on anonymized data, but the attacker seeks to reverse-engineer the model to recover sensitive customer financial information.
